title: Textile, 1962
medium:
Medium: silk, acetate warp, acetate and viscose weft
Technique: jacquard woven, hand-cut satin, some areas of velvet
description: Fragment of jacquard, hand-cut satin, showing all-over rose pattern. Areas filled with velvet. Pattern reversible.
